mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bbs(bid, title, content, writer, regdate, category, duedate, splace1, splace2, splace3, status) values(#{bid}, #{title},#{content},#{writer},now(),#{category},#{duedate}, #{splace1}, #{splace2}, #{splace3}, #{status})
mapper.select: select rowid from tbl_sequence where tid='F001'
mapper.update: update tbl_sequence set rowid = #{rowid} where tid='F001'
mapper.select: select * from tbl_bbs b, tbl_file f where b.bid=f.bid and ismain='y' order by duedate asc, b.bid asc limit #{i}, 12
mapper.update: update tbl_bbs set applycnt=applycnt+1 where bid=#{bid}
update tbl_bbs set applycnt=applycnt-1 where bid=#{bid}
